text:
Victoria’s Secret is one of the most popular brands worldwide, and it is most commonly known for lingerie. But their array of fragrances with sweet, fruity, and floral notes is not something that you can miss out on. The best Victoria’s Secret perfumes evoke something unique in your personality type. They offer a wide range of fragrance mists that suits everyone. However, choosing a perfume that matches your preferences can be puzzling. So, after consulting Blanka Crozier, Fragrance Collector and Critic, I have carefully picked a list of signature Victoria’s Secret scents that will definitely lift your spirit. Check out this list of the 20 best Victoria’s Secret perfumes with enchanting fragrances. Keep scrolling!

20 Best Victoria’s Secret Perfumes For Women – 2025

1. Best Overall: Bombshell Eau de Parfum

4.5 Image: Victorias Secret

The best seller in Victoria’s Secret perfume collection, Bombshell is a fruity floral scent also known as the ‘LBD of Fragrance’. The perfume contains notes of Purple Passion Fruit, Shangri-La Peony, and Vanilla Orchid that combine to give you a fragrance that is the perfect blend of flowers and fruits. Started as part of the original Bombshell collection, this fragrance is a favorite of everyone who loves fruity-floral scents. This delicious scent is subtle and perfect for regular use.

Product Dimensions: 3.6 x 3.6 x 4.8 inches | Weight: 8 Ounces

Pros

Not overpowering

Pleasant fruity notes, suitable for people of all ages

Cons

Does not last long

Pro Tip Pro Tip To make the fragrance more prominent and long-lasting, spray it on your skin after using the Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Fine Fragrance Lotion.

Bombshell Eau de Parfum Review

Kick-starting this list for today is everybody’s eternal favorite from the Victoria’s Secret Collection—the Bombshell Eau de Parfum. With notes of Purple Passion Fruit, Shangri-La Peony and Vanilla Orchid, Bombshell is a subtle pleasure to the senses which very, very few perfumes have come close to in my humble opinion (Ferragamo’s Incanto Shine being one of them). This pleasant fruity floral scent comes with no limits on what ages may or may not use it and is a hit with young girls and women alike for not being too overpowering. Also, thanks to the fact that it isn’t what one would call a ‘statement perfume’, there are no restrictions on what time of the day, or in what sort of crowd one can use this perfume making it a winner all the way. My only complaint with this perfume is that it doesn’t stay on for as long as one would’ve liked, requiring constant reapplication. But if that doesn’t pose a problem to you, Bombshell is one perfume that should definitely make it to your shopping list this season. To get a better understanding of this fragrance, check out this video on YouTube that details a tester’s experience with the product.

Why We Think It's Worth Buying There are more than 1,876 Amazon reviews attesting to the quality of the product and endorsing its value.

2. Best For Mature Women: Heavenly Eau de Parfum

4.6 Image: Victorias Secret

A warm and ethereal scent that Victoria’s Secret describes as ‘an angel favorite’, Heavenly Eau de Parfum combines notes of White Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla and White Peony that make it an award-winning favorite.

Product Dimensions: 2.4 x 2.8 x 5 inches | Weight: 1.7 Ounces

Pros

Strikes a good balance between floral and fruity

Lasts long

Light, pleasant fragrance

Cons

Mature fragrance—better suited to grown-up women

Vanilla tones might be overpowering for some

Heavenly Eau de Parfum Review

For women who’d like Victoria’s Secret bestseller that has no hint of floral or fruity in it, here’s Heavenly to the rescue. A bestseller since its launch, this particular musky Victoria’s Secret scent has undergone a revamp in recent times to make it more appealing to the new generation, though thankfully its intrinsic tones have remained the same. The new Heavenly now comes in a bottle that has angel wings on the cap and is embellished with tiny crystals—an ode to their VS angel fashion show? That’s what I’m assuming too. But a nice touch nonetheless. Coming to the fragrance itself, I find that the notes of White Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla, and White Peony lend it a striking warm essence that to me speaks elegance and sensuality. In fact, the sandalwood and musk, in addition to giving Heavenly a distinctly musky flavor, also lend to its longevity that Bombshell lacks, thus making it perfect for long-term wear. As a woman trying to make a subtle yet defining impression, there could hardly be an intense scent than this. Keep in mind though, that this warm Victoria’s Secret perfume might be better suited to grown-up women than teenagers .

NOTE- Image used for representation is a special edition bottle.

4.5 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Pure Seduction Body Mist has a new, better-than-ever formula. This translucent mist is designed to mix, blend, and play for a unique aroma, with red plum and freesia. It feels great on the skin and boosts your confidence all day. This is best for special occasions.

Product Dimensions: 1.7 x 1.7 x 6.8 inches | Weight: 8.82 Ounces

Pros

Sweet and fruity aroma

Has moisturizing properties

Gives a seductive and appealing aroma

Travel-friendly packaging

Cons

Expensive

Pro Tip Pro Tip Apply this perfume to your pulse points to retain its fragrance for a long time. Do not rub the scent into your skin; the smell will fade soon.

Pure Seduction is a sensual scent that makes you think of a romantic dinner date at a fancy location. Red plum, sweet melon, and freesia enrich the aroma making you smell fresh and pleasant. The romantic Victoria’s Secret scent combines fruity and flowery notes. Aloe vera and chamomile essence are added to the glamorous scent, making it moisturizing as well. This would be the ideal scent to complete your look and feel for a leisurely Sunday morning wearing a gorgeous summer dress and dark burgundy lips!

4.6 Image: Victoria's Secret

The avant-garde Victoria’s Secret Tease Rebel wraps you in a soft sweet fragrance. The floral notes of violet and wild rose feel refreshing and the hints of white leather give the perfume a rich and warm edge. The balanced floral and warm notes of the concentrated perfume lift your mood and boost your confidence.

Pros

Long-lasting

Good sillage

Refreshing fragrance

Cons

Cannot be layered

Victoria’s Secret Tease Rebel Review

The Victoria’s Secret Tease Rebel is a total show stealer. It surrounds you with a soft aroma. The sweet floral notes of violet and rose mix seamlessly with the warm notes of leather. The light and airy feel of the perfume refreshes your senses and makes your day. The perfume bottle is designed with a mesh black wrap around the mouth that looks luxe. Thus, it is ideal for gifting. Energize your bogged-down senses by misting this versatile scent.

5. Best Travel-Friendly: Very Sexy Night

4.6 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy Night EDP is a sensual and seductive fragrance that is perfect for women who want to feel confident and alluring. The scent features notes of black plum, velvet woods, and luscious apple, creating a warm and floral aroma that is perfect for nighttime wear. This alluring Victoria’s Secret scent is perfect for on-the-go use and incorporates the energy of one of the world’s most famous city.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.75 x 3 x 5.25 inches |Weight :12 Ounces

Pros

Sensual aroma

Long-lasting

Cons

None

Very Sexy Night Eau de Parfum Review

Everyone should own Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy Night Eau de Perfume! This is a great option if you’re seeking for a sensuous and seductive scent that is ideal for wearing at night. There is hardly a better scent for a woman aiming to leave a subtle but lasting impression. Reviewers on Amazon have noted that this fragrance may be more appropriate for adult women than teenage girls.

6. Best Spicy Fragrance: Rapture Eau de Cologne

4.5 Image: Victorias Secret

Get ready to be hit with the right chords of nostalgia with the Victoria’s Secret Rapture Eau de Cologne. It has a non-fruity, non-chemical fragrance. This irresistible Victoria’s Secret perfume was launched in 1992 and has been retired and relaunched many times now. It combines the unique notes of orange blossom, amber, citruses, and white jasmine, to offer women a rejuvenating fragrance that is spicy yet pleasant.

Scent: Rapture

Pros

Long-lasting

Amber spicy fragrance

Cons

Availability issues

Rapture Eau de Cologne Review

Let me warn you – Rapture is like no other fragrance from Victoria’s Secret. The spiciness of the scent is here to create a spell on you. The citrusy Victoria’s Secret fragrance opens with notes of orange blossom and citruses, blending into the heart notes of jasmine, Bulgarian rose, and freesia to give you a heavenly fragrance. The base notes of amber, heliotrope, vanilla, and musk again rule the traces of the whole perfume, making you stand out in the crowd like never before. You can check out this YouTube video for a brief review of this perfume and to know more about a reviewer’s experience with it.

Why We Think It's Worth Buying The product has more than 1,377 reviews claiming its efficacy.

4.6 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret XO, Victoria is spring in a bottle. It is crafted with the floral notes of Victoria rose, orchid, and ivy that evoke freshness. The fruity citrus and lady apple notes evoke a sense of vibrancy. This fresh and vivid fragrance is an all-time stunner in the perfume industry. This is great for office wear too.

Pros

Clean fragrance

Pretty packaging

Cons

May not be long-lasting

Victoria’s Secret XO, Victoria Review

The XO, Victoria is a sophisticated fragrance for your daily life. The top notes of lady apple and citrus add a fun vibe to it while the heart notes of rose and orchid bring forth a soothing floral twist. The warm ivy note at the base has a sense of richness that lifts your mood. Reviewers adore the perfume bottle for being sleek and having an aesthetic appeal.

8. Best Gourmand Fragance: Victoria’s Secret Tease

4.6 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Tease Eau de Parfum is a warm and sweet scent that combines the floral notes of white gardenia and anjou pear with the creamy aroma of black vanilla. Reviews on Amazon have noted that the perfume can be paired with the Tease Fine Fragrance Mist and Lotion for layering. Together, they can deliver a fascinating aroma that lingers all day with no requirement of retouch. This oriental scent is a seasonal perfume that can make heads turn.

Product Dimensions: 4 x 5 x 4 inches | Weight: 3.53 Ounces

Pros

Long-lasting scent

Good sillage

Best for regular use

Cons

None

Pro Tip Pro Tip Store this perfume in a cool, dry place to retain its original sweet fragrance.

Victoria’s Secret Tease Review

This perfume is perfect for a lasting impression as the marvelous scent leaves behind a sillage so awesome, its bound to turn some heads! The combined notes of warm and soft vanilla, floral gardenia, and the burst of freshness from anjour pear all add to the appeal of this daily wear, feminine Victoria’s Secret scent. The fruity-floral fragrance packaging is chic and feminine which makes it a perfect gifting option for all romantic dates and partners.

4.5 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Midnight Bloom Mist has a classic aroma with a touch of sophistication. The infusion of floral and woody aroma in the bold Victoria’s Secret scent keeps you relaxed, fresh, and smelling amazing. This is great for office wear as the scent lasts long.

Product Dimensions: 2.1 x 2.1 x 6.9 inches | Weight: 0.01 Ounces.

Pros

Long-lasting

Affordable

Travel-friendly

Cons

Few may find the scent strong.

Victoria’s Secret Midnight Bloom Mist Review

The Midnight Bloom by Victoria’s Secret is a lovely smell with notes of moonflower, velvety woods, and star-crossed lovers. The lightest form of the warm floral scent is ideal for a short spritz throughout the day to keep you feeling fresh and active. This perfume comprises 1-3% perfume oil . You can wear this mild but enchanting Victoria’s Secret fragrance daily for fresh floral bliss. Wear it on your pulse points on moisturized skin so that it keeps you smelling fresh throughout the day.

10. Best Memorable Fragrance: Victoria’s Secret Love Eau de Parfum

4.6 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Love Eau de Parfum is a fresh and alluring fragrance that captures the essence of modern romance. The top-selling scent is one of the iconic Victoria’s Secret perfumes. It opens with notes of fresh juniper, followed by a heart of apricot blush and a base of boyfriend tee, creating a refreshing and feminine aroma. This eau de parfum is the most concentrated, pure version of the fragrance, making it perfect for a long-lasting fragrance experience. This timeless allure of love is packed in this fragrance.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.06 x 3.27 x 3.23 inches | Weight : 15.52 Ounces

Pros

Long lasting

Unique aroma

Cons

None

Victoria’s Secret Love Eau de Parfum Review

The Victoria’s Secret Love Eau de Parfum is a captivating fragrance that’s perfect for everyday wear. If you’re looking for a fresh and alluring fragrance, this is an excellent choice. One of the distinctive qualities of this scent is its ability to be applied over complementing Love Fine Fragrance Lotion to provide a long-lasting fragrance impression. It is a great addition to any perfume collection, with its fresh and alluring scent and stylish packaging providing excellent value for the price. This distinctive signature is a must-have in every makeup essential.

11. Best For Family Vacation: Crush Eau de Parfum

No products found.

A zany mix of floral and spice, Victoria’s Secret ‘Crush’ is a young, fresh scent that bottles the feeling of being addicted to someone. This summery fragrance is best for a family vacation perfume and comes in a no-fuss bottle. This season perfume is great if you are looking for refreshing the body and mind.

Product Dimensions: 2.76 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches | Weight: 14.11 Ounces

Pros

Sweetness isn’t too overpowering

Citrus base

Summer go-to

A youthful, fresh scent

Cons

Seasonal perfume

Victoria’s Secret Crush Perfume Review

Channeling a whole lot of pink and a whole lot of cute in its packaging, Crush is Victoria’s Secret offering for youngsters, and for the young at heart. With notes of Pink Peppercorn, Treasure Peony and Ashok flower, Crush takes you on a frosting filled trip to wonderland right from the first spritz. What I like best about this Crush fragrance is that though sweet and high on its own ‘youthfulness’, at no point is the sweetness too overpowering an attack on the senses. With a warm, citrus base, Crush makes for the perfect summer scent and considering I live in a tropical country, it comes in handy pretty much all year round. But that very seasonality is also a bane as people who live in colder areas might not find it much to their liking. So, do keep that in mind before you go out shopping for this one.

P.S.- I bought this perfume for my niece last Christmas, and I don’t think I could’ve chosen any better. This is why I now nominate Crush as the perfect gift for female members of your family this festive season too. Do let me know how that fares!

12. Best Secret Perfumes: Tease Eau de Parfum

4.6 Image: Victorias Secret

Designed as the consummate flirt, Victoria’s Secret Tease is the result of what happens when a seductress meets a coquette—a fragrance that is the ultimate in the art of seduction. This top-selling scent falls among the top flirtatious Victoria’s Secret perfumes.

Product Dimensions: 3.94 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches | Weight: 1.06 Ounces

Pros

Beautifully packaged

Not harsh on the skin

Warm scent

Cons

Longevity is terrible

Not travel-friendly

Not suited to all age groups

Tease Eau de Parfum Review

There isn’t a single thing I dislike about how Tease looks sitting on my vanity, a boudoir inspired fragrance that is an instant throwback to the parlors of France. The fishnet and lace packaging on the bottle coupled with the hot pink atomizer makes for some truly attractive packaging that I fell so in love with at first glance. Full marks to whoever came up with the design for this little baby. As for the fragrance itself, combining notes of Black Vanilla, Frozen Pear, and Blooming Gardenia, I find that coming to Victoria’s Secret collection at least, this fragrance truly is the ultimate ‘tease’. A warm scent that I feel is better carried off by grown women, the major downer with this fragrance is its longevity. At barely an hour or two of staying power, Tease hardly lasts you for even a quarter of a day which is a shame as it has a pleasant dry down that I liked smelling for whatever little time it lasted. If longevity isn’t a concern you have, Tease might just make another great gift this festive season, this time for the ladies of your family.

13. Best For Gift: Very Sexy Eau de Parfum

4.6 Image: Victorias Secret

Seduction in a bottle, Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy has been a crowd favorite right since its launch in the early 2000s. A ‘spicy’ scent, it combines notes of Vanilla Orchid, Sun-drenched Clementine, and Midnight Blackberry.

Product Dimensions: 1.77 x 3.07 x 6.5 inches | Weight: 4.8 Ounces

Pros

Spicy fragrance

Arousing (as reported by users)

Cons

Not for regular wear

Strong scent, to be used with a light hand

Very Sexy Eau de Parfum Review

Honest to heaven, I’d like to tip my hat to whoever at Victoria’s Secret came up with this fragrance. A strong, spicy scent that has undertones of Vanilla Orchid, Sun-drenched Clementine, and Midnight Blackberry, Very Sexy hasn’t been taken off the shelves since its launch in the 2000s. Imagine! But smell it once, and it isn’t too hard to understand why, as Very Sexy has a delectable peppery fragrance that exudes a strong come-hither scent that is difficult to resist, and (reportedly) is a crowd favorite with boyfriends and husbands alike. Be careful to use it with a light hand though as it is a strong perfume. Not suitable for regular wear either.

14. Best For Beach Vibe: Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy Sea Fine Fragrance Mist

4.5 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy Sea Fine Fragrance Mist feels fresh like a day at the beach. The fragrance opens up with bright and refreshing notes of citrus bergamot and Neroli blossom. The sun-drenched cedar adds a dash of freshness and surrounds you with a not-so-overwhelming but lingering sultry scent.

Pros

Can be easily layered

Not overwhelming

Cons

Might not last long without touch-ups

Victoria’s Secret Very Sexy Sea Fine Fragrance Mist Review

The Very Sexy Sea Fine Fragrance Mist wraps you in a bitter-sweet fragrance. It is composed of a blend of Italian bergamot, sundrenched cedar, and neroli blossom that releases a light floral, citrusy scent. You can easily layer this mild perfume with similar scented products to create an intense fragrance. The elegant teal bottle of the perfume exudes sophistication. Spray it once and enjoy the refreshing vigor all day long.

15. Best For Night: Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Seduction

4.5 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Seduction has an unmissable airy feel. It is composed of a blend of white peony and creamy tuberose that transports you to a floral land. And the velvet musky note adds the perfect warmth to the fragrance, giving it a sexy touch. This intense scent is perfect for special occasions and even formal occasions.

Pros

Long-lasting

Romantic fragrance

Can be layered with other Bombshell perfumes

Cons

Some may find it strong

Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Seduction Review

Bombshell Seduction is the ideal fragrance to set the mood for your cozy date nights. The intoxicating floral notes of white peony and creamy tuberose add a romantic touch, while the warm velvet musk creates a mysterious but calming sense. Layer this fragrance with the other perfumes of the Bombshell collection for a unique experience and exceptional results. The perfume comes in a simple chic bottle that is absolutely adorable.

16. Best For Girls: Berry Pop Body Mist

This body mist is a combination of fruits fresh at the market, evoking a memory of a vivid summer afternoon. With the infusion of essential oils, the fruity Victoria’s Secret fragrance keeps you smelling and your skin feeling sunny and bright. This light scent is best for casual wear for a day out with friends.

Product Dimensions: 2 x 2 x 6 inches | Weight: 8.4 Ounces.

Pros

Fresh fruity fragrance

Summer fragrance

Cons

None

Berry Pop Body Mist Review

Despite being a summer fragrance, Berry Pop Body Mist will have your heart all year round. With the amalgamation of the beautiful frozen strawberry, pink hibiscus, and amber crystals as its notes, the scent gives you fresh-juice feels that not only quenches your skin’s thirst but also provokes your senses gently. This body mist is a fond fragrance to remember someone as it would bring back pleasant moments of joy, fun, and all things sunny. Wear this sweet-smelling scent for a day out with your girls or for a picnic with your family, and see yourself blush as the compliments pour in.

17. Best For All Times: Love Fragrance Mist

This fragrance is as light as air and is so captivating that it makes you impossible to forget. It gives a little remembrance of him that smells seductive on you. This special occasion perfume can work well for a date with its tempting fragrance.



Product Dimensions: 2 x 2 x 6 inches | Weight: 8.4 Ounces.

Pros

Long-lasting

Fresh flowery fragrance

Cons

None

Love Fragrance Mist Review

Love Fragrance Mist is a beloved fragrance from the family of Victoria’s Secret. Infused with the notes of fresh air flowers, this scent is delicate yet heavenly. This elegant and sophisticated scent is ideal for all occasions. Its soft flowery fragrance adds to the simplicity of your overall personality. If you want to speak for less is more, this sophisticated Victoria’s Secret scent should be your best bet for all times.

1 8. Best Sensual Fragrance: Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Intense

4.4 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Intense Eau de Parfum is an enticing and sensual scent that is sure to leave an impact. This smell is ideal for a night out and combines luscious scents of cherry, crimson peony, and seductive vanilla. Since it is the purest and most concentrated form of fragrance, Eau de parfum, the smell lasts all day .

Product Dimensions: 19.69 x 19.69 x 11.02 inches | Weight: 8.16 Ounces.

Pros

Captivating scent

Long-lasting fragrance

Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Intense Review

People love Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Intense Eau de Parfum for its captivating and seductive scent. The scent notes of lush cherry, red peony, and sultry vanilla are perfectly balanced, creating a bold, edgy yet feminine fragrance. The eau de parfum concentration is evident as the scent lasts all day without needing to reapply. Also, the option to layer it with the matching body lotion and mist for an even longer-lasting experience, makes it even better. The packaging is sleek and stylish, making it a great addition to any perfume collection. It is highly recommended to give the Victoria’s Secret Bombshell Intense Eau de Parfum a try if you’re looking for a new fragrance to slay the world.

19. Best Sensitive Skin: Victoria’s Secret Angel Gold Rollerball

4.2 Image: Victoria's Secret

The Victoria’s Secret Angel Gold Rollerball opens up with a burst of fruity and floral notes. The top note of Bergamot engulfs you with an elegant freshness that is merged seamlessly with the floral heart notes of lush gardenia. The cocooning musk closes the scent with rich warmth. However, if you have sensitive skin, conduct a patch test before committing to this perfume.

Pros

Mild, soothing fragrance

Travel-friendly

Cons

Not very long-lasting

Victoria’s Secret Angel Gold Rollerball Review

Victoria’s Secret Angel Gold has just the right amount of sweetness and freshness. The cool bergamot note seamlessly mixes with the soft lush gardenia note, producing a refreshing, delicate scent. The luxurious warmth of musk leaves you feeling calm and relaxed. This perfume effuses an effervescent fragrance that is statement-making and remains suitable for all occasions. It has rollerball packaging that is easy to use and convenient to carry. While it may not be for sensitive skin, its moderate longevity makes it a fun scent that can be layered on.

20. Best Long-Lasting: Candy Rocks Body Mist

Wild meets sweet in this coveted fragrance by Victoria’s Secret infused with sugared watermelon, which is sweet yet wild. It contains conditioning aloe to let you love your skin while feeling like you’re in candy store. It works well for casual wear too.

Item Weight: 8.4 Ounces

Pros

Fruity fragrance

Long-lasting

Cons

None

Candy Rocks Body Mist Review

Who doesn’t love fruits and candies? There’s always a child hidden in us that wishes to run across a candy street, wild and free. This body mist from Victoria’s Secret is a reminiscence of childhood. It takes you down memory lane and is perfect to be worn any time of the day. The fruity fragrance is rejuvenating and uplifting in a heartbeat. The warm and wild scents are a mixture of both worlds. Reviews on Amazon indicate that the perfume can be ideal for casual hangouts during the day or early evening.

The Bottom Line Victoria’s Secret is a must-try if you love trying unique fragrances. These expertly crafted perfumes have a pleasant fragrance, and they define your personality. These fragrances evoke your senses and instantly lift your mood. The Bombshell Eau de Parfum is perfect for those who love a floral fruity scent, while the Victoria’s Secret Pure Seduction Body Mist is travel-friendly and light on the skin. But if you are looking for a long-lasting sweet scent, try the Victoria’s Secret Tease. Victoria’s Secret perfumes offer a wide range of mists and are available in different fragrances like White Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla that suit everyone. These perfumes are suitable for people who dislike wearing strong perfumes. It is always best to do a patch test to see if it suits your skin type. Go through the buying guide and product reviews to pick the fragrance you prefer to add to your collection.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do all Victoria’s Secret perfumes last all day?

Yes, Victoria’s Secret perfumes are lightweight, subtle, and last all day long. Most of them do not need reapplication.

Which flavor of Victoria’s Secret is the best?

While every Victoria’s Secret perfume has a unique flavor and fragrance, the Bombshell New York stands apart due to its enriching blend of flowers and fruits like passion fruit, Shangri-la peony, and vanilla orchid.

Is Victoria’s Secret a luxury brand?

Yes. Victoria’s Secret is a luxury brand that manufactures a collection of premium-quality perfumes, body care products, lingerie, and athleisure.

Why Trust StyleCraze?

Jyotsana Rao, the author, is a skin care and makeup enthusiast who loves trying new products that make one feel pampered and luxurious. She has carefully gone through several customer reviews and has tried some for herself before bringing you this list of the top Victoria’s Secret perfumes. These classy, luxurious perfumes mesmerize your senses and suit every occasion. Floral, woody, wild, or subtle – go ahead and pick one that best suits your mood and fancy!
